encoding = b'B\x00\x00'
base = primitives.Base()
base.write_tag(self.stream)
result = self.stream.read()
len_exp = len(encoding)
len_rcv = len(result)
self.assertEqual(len_exp, len_rcv, self.bad_write.format('tag', '{0} bytes'
    .format(len_exp), '{0} bytes'.format(len_rcv)))
self.assertEqual(encoding, result, self.bad_encoding.format('tag'))
